page.pageDescription: This site serves as a resume and portfolio.

responsability: writing based on design, testable, efficient code by using best web development practices
building simple websites from pdf and psd all the way to completion from the bottom up, fashioning everything from the home page to site layout and function using HTML and CSS
integrate based on designs and requirements tables, forms, dropdown menus, mega menus for small and large projects
taking and arranging property viewings efficiently
making sure all clients are referenced and checked in the filing process prior the contract
negotiating and closing existing and new offers and contracts
selling all company services strongly and ethically
online touting and canvassing for new clients on social media
solve any customer enquiries, or liaise with the competent partners for the relevant raised issues
keeping records of all activity and improving the possible client database
company car and phone in care
staff management, training and recruiting
creating the working rota efficiently to fit the business requirements financially and the client professionally
stock keeping and daily ordering of goods
assist with menu creation and weekly specials
taking bookings and managing turning times
table and bar service
developing recurring business by maintaining  meaningful relationships with the customers
ensure that guests have a good time at the restaurant and look immediately into any complainants they might have
food and wine matching and guiding guests throughout their restaurant experience

content.title: Daniel Varvara
text: I’m an ambitious problem solver with a natural passion for coding, heart for art and science. I am thorough and focused in everything I do with a keen interest in all web development technologies. I have a sharp eye for details and ready to go the extra mile.

card.title: Working well within a team as well as on my own

The 'social' property value is an array of objects,
a collection of objects, and each object has two properties,
an icon and an url. The collection and Those properties
will be used to generate the social media link bar.
